Delirious 30. Oriental Beat	31. Million Miles Away 32. Up Around The Bend  Buried Alive is a concert music video by the Finnish glam punk and rock band Hanoi Rocks. The video was recorded at the Tavastia Club in Helsinki of the band's final show. The band's original rhythm guitarist Nasty Suicide appeared as a special guest on this (last show).
title: Hanoi Rocks - Buried Alive
